price: Magsasabi ang tao [na tagatangging sumampalataya]: “Kapag namatay ba ako ay talagang ilalabas akong buhay?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوۡفَ أُخۡرَجُ حَيًّا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlu al-insānu a-idhā mā mittu lasawfa ukh'raju ḥayyan
